Text.Value: We don't have time. Get to the boat, or we leave!

EditorData.NodeContext: calling out to the player, who is in combat. Wants to leave on the boat and now

EditorData.stateContext: Doesn't necessarily play on seeing boat. Wulbren could use this line without freeing the tieflings or after freeing the tieflings, for instance.

EditorData.NodeContext: leaving without the player in the boat - the only means of escape from moonrise

EditorData.stateContext: Guards have sounded the alarm. The prisoners hear this.
If a character was on the way to the boat and couldn't leave because of various reasons,

EditorData.NodeContext: Finally freed the boat, time to leave - tense, combat all around, frantic

Text.Value: The sooner the boat leaves the better.

EditorData.NodeContext: tense and shell shocked - waiting by the boat. Just wants to leave.

Text.Value: It's just ahead - I can see the way out!

EditorData.NodeContext: running ahead, JUST about to escape from the bad guys.

EditorData.stateContext: IN COMBAT. Is preparing boat for departure. Under a LOT of stress.

EditorData.NodeContext: struggling to break the chains that have tied up the boat (no guarantee of what he'll be using, either barehands or a discovered weapon)

EditorData.stateContext: IN COMBAT. One person signals that they have to defend the boat.

Text.Value: What in the hells? Damn it all - they'll be here soon. Hurry!

EditorData.NodeContext: alarm is blaring in the prison

Text.Value: This thing is chained up tight - hold on.

EditorData.NodeContext: struggling to break the chains that have tied up the boat (no guarantee of what he'll be using, either barehands or a discovered weapon)

Text.Value: Think. Think - there must be a way around.

EditorData.NodeContext: stuck at a pier, no boat. Trapped and frantic
calling out to the player, who is in combat. Wants to leave on the boat and now

Text.Value: This pit is making my skin crawl. Isn't it time to go?

EditorData.NodeContext: running through a prison, scared for his life

Text.Value: Hold them off - I'll take care of the chains.

EditorData.NodeContext: gritted teeth, trying to break the chains that have tied up the boat. Trying not to panic

Text.Value: A boat! Let's grab it and get out of here.

EditorData.NodeContext: sees a boat just ahead - it's his way of escaping moonrise. Hope
gritted teeth, trying to break the chains that have tied up the boat. Trying not to panic

EditorData.stateContext: Character is about to disappear out of sight outside the tower, past the docks area.
OUT OF COMBAT. Another character is nearby and this character is idling by.

Text.Value: Damn it - keep them away from the boat!

EditorData.NodeContext: Just begun combat, scared but determined to fight - even if it costs him his life

EditorData.logicalname: Danis: boat leaves after this line

EditorData.NodeContext: running through a prison, scared for his life

EditorData.stateContext: OUT OF COMBAT. Running for their life to whatever escape point they may reach. It could be the boat, it could be the pier outside.
OUT OF COMBAT. Is preparing boat for departure. Under stress.

Text.Value: I can't believe we made it.

Synopsis: Collection of solo ADs used by character during the Jailbreak escape in Moonrise Towers.
